attributes.action: Excuse the current P.M. Ministers. Membership of Parliament, Agencies and Quangoes, Regional and Government Agencies, from receiving any Honours awarded by this Goverment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the disgaceful actions in the misuse of Taxpayers funds by Ministers, MP's, House of Lords and other members of the current Government in power. 
I Petition the current P.M. and Awarding bodies of Honours, to Excuse themselves from conferring any Honours on its members and working non members,  inclusive of all Political Parties, Government, Agencies, Quangos. Ect. IE: All past and present Parliamentary members of the Blair/Brown  to forgoe any awards from the PM. Gordon Brown, when his term as Prime Minister ends.
They do not Deserve any Honours !!!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
